item.title: What to know about missing Malaysian Airlines Flight MH370 as search resumes
item.description: More than a decade after Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 vanished, the mystery remains unsolved

item.title: Iran's currency falls to a new low as nuclear sanctions squeeze its ailing economy
item.description: Iran's rial currency has fallen to a new low of 1.2 million to the U.S. dollar as nuclear sanctions squeeze the economy

item.title: Edmunds SUV comparison: New Toyota RAV4 vs Honda CR-V
item.description: Compact SUVs have become an extremely popular choice for folks who need a vehicle that can do it all without compromising everyday usability

item.title: Thailand lifts ban on afternoon alcohol sales in time for year-end festivities
item.description: Thailand has lifted a 53-year-old ban on the afternoon retail sale of alcoholic drinks

item.title: Hong Kong leader says fire investigation 'must uncover the truth' and promises construction reforms
item.description: Hong Kong is setting up an independent committee to investigate a deadly fire that burned seven apartment buildings and killed at least 156 people
